foods.recipe: Pad Thai is a popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, shrimp or chicken, eggs, tofu, bean sprouts, and a flavorful sauce. It is often garnished with crushed peanuts, lime wedges, and fresh cilantro.

Tom Yum Soup is a spicy and sour Thai soup made with fragrant herbs, lemongrass, lime juice, fish sauce, and a combination of shrimp, chicken, or mushrooms. It is known for its vibrant flavors and is often served with steamed rice.

Green Curry, also known as Kaeng Khiao Wan, is a spicy Thai curry made with green chili paste, coconut milk, and a variety of vegetables and meat or seafood. It is traditionally served with steamed rice.

Massaman Curry is a rich and flavorful Thai curry made with a fragrant blend of spices, coconut milk, meat (such as beef or chicken), potatoes, onions, and peanuts. It offers a unique combination of sweet, savory, and tangy flavors.

Mango Sticky Rice, also known as Khao Niao Mamuang, is a popular Thai dessert made with glutinous rice, fresh mango slices, and a sweet coconut sauce. The rice is cooked with coconut milk for a creamy texture, and it is often garnished with toasted sesame seeds.
